label: Photograph albums, Series I.

metadata.label: Arrangement
metadata.value: Arranged in three subseries: I.A. Stock albums; I.B. Collectors' albums; I.C. Other albums.

description: Series I contains photograph albums of artworks that were acquired or sold by Duveen Brothers, albums documenting the collections of the firm's important clients, and albums unrelated to the firm's stock, which were apparently compiled primarily for reference.
